history.narrative: Law 7-188 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-330, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 25, 1988 and November 15, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 1, 1988, it was assigned Act No. 7-250 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
